revised_title: Seismic Spectra Analysis and Earthquake Mechanisms
tldr: The authors apply normal mode theory to analyze seismic spectra and retrieve structural parameters and source mechanisms of earthquakes. They develop a cyclic process to refine Earth structure models and earthquake mechanisms using a global network of seismographs. The study presents two new Earth models and discusses the compressive changes in volume during earthquakes, suggesting the possibility of "silent earthquakes."
